entry.title: 0.4rc1 known bugs
entry.summary: A solution has been found for the encrypted-wallet mining issue with the introduction of 'unique_coinbase'. This solution depends on and merges with the getwork_dedupe fix already present in pools and other miners who keep up with the latest mining fixes. In order to merge the unique_coinbase solution, one must first fetch it from git://gitorious.org/~Luke-Jr/bitcoin/luke-jr-bitcoin.git and then merge FETCH_HEAD.
